name: Plant Growth
description:
A game by  silviacavadas, monkeyotoshi  and leorangesheep for the second Fem Devs Meetup Game Jam with theme "Mother Nature".

Click on the marked points to make the plant grow until it blossoms. Balance the growth to make sure the plant doesn't dry up or die out.  Tips: Pay attention to the bulb's look and the color of the ground. The weather matters.  (The mechanics could still use a bit of tuning...  but hey, game jam!)

Hope you enjoy it!
